Detailed Description

Is the abstract base class of button controls. Every button control may have an instance of the class Action, which is executed when the button control is triggered.

BOOLEAN AbstractButton::SetProperty (  ResourceParser &  parser,
const GuiObjectFactory::PropertyId  prop_id
) 
 

Used by Aragon to read out the windows property out of the resource parser. It is not allowed for an application developer to invoke this method in a direct manner.

void AbstractButton::SetText (  const WCHAR *  text  ) 
 

Wrapper-method for button.GetAction()->SetText(text).

void AbstractButton::Trigger (   ) 
 

Invokes the methods OnClick and OnRelease, which is useful when the button should be triggered externally by e. g. a softkey.
